doc.after: Besides the United States the British Empire and the Soviet Union there have been many attempts by historians to apply the term superpower retrospectively and sometimes very loosely to a variety of past entities Recognition by historians of these older states as superpowers may focus on various superlative traits exhibited by them Examples of these ancient or historic superpowers include Ancient Egypt 12 the Persian Empire 13 the Greek Empire of Alexander the Great 14 the Roman Empire 15 the Mongol Empire the Ottoman Empire the Portuguese Empire the Spanish Empire 16 and the First French Empire of Napoleon 17
